That is as American as it can get. But much of what happened last night was despicable. utterances.sentences: No, Sean, can you see how happy I am since I left the Democratic plantation? I'm happy, I'm smiley. Let me tell you what's going on. utterances.speaker: HANNITY
utterances.sentences: Well, from your lips, Leo. We'll see. Leo 2.0, Herschel Walker, thank you both. utterances.speaker: HANNITY

They followed us for about three miles threats, threats, ethnic insults to my wife who's Hispanic. Please tell me to the liberals listening at any point, this was a BLM group, by the way. These are not protesters. They're not trying to convince you of anything are Democrat shock troops on the front line trying to scare the hell out of you. That's what they are.

We're horrified by it, anarchy is spreading everywhere, the rule of law is eroding, people don't have confidence in the system anymore. You know I understand that it's trespassing, it's harassment, it's -- it's probably assault also, but they're -- they're pushing me and pushing me I'm forced to respond and once I respond I know that I'm going to be caught up in the in the complication the molasses of the criminal justice system and it's going to -- it's going to wreck my life and lawsuits and all the rest of it. utterances.utterance: Well, I mean --

utterances.utterance: Open nothing, closed everything, blackmail theoretically possible, not the strongest theory. Meanwhile, other agents texted about the rampant leaking surrounding the case.
